title: The Disappearance of Elias Vane
hook: Elias Vane, 16, vanished three nights ago. His bike was found near the treeline.
description: Investigate the disappearance. Determine if he ran away, was taken, or if something else happened.

outcomes.description: You conclude Elias ran away to escape abuse.
outcomes.narrative_text: You file the report. Elias is listed as a runaway. The police scale back the search. Weeks later, his shoes are found in the ice.

outcomes.description: You accuse the Church of Ice.
outcomes.narrative_text: You raid the church basement. You find symbols, but no Elias. The cult denies everything, and now they are watching you.

outcomes.description: You realize the Aurora took him.
outcomes.narrative_text: You track the energy signatures. You find him... or what's left of him, crystallized in the permafrost. At least his parents have closure.
